00027 class tx_MailformPlusPlus_Dispatcher extends tslib_pibase {
00028         
00036         protected function handleAjax() {
00037                 if(t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('xajax')) {
00038                         require (t3lib_extMgm::extPath('xajax') . 'class.tx_xajax.php');
00039                         $this->xajax = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tx_xajax');
00040                         $this->xajax->statusMessagesOn();
00041                         $this->xajax->debugOn();
00042                         $this->prefixId = "F3_MailformPlusPlus";
00043                         $view = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Default");
00044                         $this->xajax->registerFunction(array($this->prefixId.'_removeUploadedFile', &$view, 'removeUploadedFile'));
00045                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData[$this->prefixId] = $this->xajax->getJavascript(t3lib_extMgm::siteRelPath('xajax'));
00046                         $this->xajax->processRequests();
00047                 }
00048         }
00049         
00058         public function main($content, $setup) {
00059                 
00060                 $this->pi_USER_INT_obj = 1;
00061                 $this->componentManager = F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager::getInstance();
00062                 $componentManager = $this->componentManager;
00063                 
00064                 //handle AJAX stuff
00065                 $this->handleAjax();
00066                 
00067                 //init flexform
00068                 $this->pi_initPIflexForm();
00069                 
00070                 /*
00071                  * set controller:
00072                  * 1. Flexform
00073                  * 2. TypoScript
00074                  * 3. Default controller
00075                  */
00076                 $controller = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'controller','sDEF');
00077                 if(!$controller) {
00078                         $controller = $setup['controller'];     
00079                 }
00080                 if(!$controller) {
00081                         $controller = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Default";
00082                 }
00083                 $controller = $componentManager->getComponent($controller);
00084                 
00085                 /*
00086                  * Parse values from flexform:
00087                  * - Template file
00088                  * - Translation file
00089                  * - Predefined form
00090                  * - E-mail settings
00091                  * - Required fields
00092                  * - Redirect page
00093                  */
00094                 $templateFile = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'template_file','sDEF');
00095                 $langFile = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'lang_file','sDEF');
00096                 $predef = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'predefined','sDEF');
00097                 $emailSettings = $this->parseEmailSettings();
00098                 $redirect = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'redirect_page','sMISC');
00099                 $requiredFields = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'required_fields','sMISC');
00100                 if(strlen($requiredFields) > 0) {
00101                         $requiredFields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$requiredFields);
00102                         $controller->setRequiredFields($requiredFields);
00103                 }
00104                 if(strlen($redirect) > 0) {
00105                         $controller->setRedirectPage($redirect);
00106                 }
00107                 
00108                 if (isset($content)) {
00109                         $controller->setContent($componentManager->getComponent('F3_MailformPlusPlus_Content', $content));
00110                 }
00111                 $controller->setEmailSettings($emailSettings);
00112                 if(strlen($templateFile) > 0) {
00113                         $controller->setTemplateFile($templateFile);
00114                 }
00115                 if(strlen($langFile) > 0) {
00116                         $controller->setLangFile($langFile);
00117                 }
00118                 if(strlen($predef) > 0) {
00119                         $controller->setPredefined($predef);
00120                 }
00121                 return $controller->process();
00122         }
00123         
00130         protected function parseEmailSettings() {
00131                 $emailSettings = array();
00132                 $options = array (
00133                         'email_to' => 'to_email',
00134                         'email_subject' => 'subject',
00135                         'email_sender' => 'sender_email',
00136                         'email_sendername' => 'sender_name',
00137                         'email_replyto' => 'replyto_email',
00138                         'email_replytoname' => 'replyto_name'
00139                 );
00140                 
00141                 //*************************
00142                 //ADMIN settings
00143                 //*************************
00144                 $emailSettings['admin'] = $this->parseEmailSettingsByType('admin',$options);
00145                 
00146                 //*************************
00147                 //USER settings
00148                 //*************************
00149                 $emailSettings['user'] = $this->parseEmailSettingsByType('user',$options);
00150                 
00151                 return $emailSettings;
00152         }
00153         
00162         private function parseEmailSettingsByType($type,$optionsToParse = array()) {
00163                 $typeLower = strtolower($type);
00164                 $typeUpper = strtoupper($type);
00165                 $section = 'sEMAIL'.$typeUpper;
00166                 $emailSettings = array();
00167                 foreach($optionsToParse as $ffname=>$option) {
00168                         if(strcmp($type,'user') == 0) {
00169                                 $ffname .= $type;
00170                         }
00171                         $value = $this->getFFvalue($ffname,$section);
00172                         if(strlen($value) > 0) {
00173                                 $emailSettings[$option] = $value;
00174                         }
00175                 }
00176                 return $emailSettings;
00177         }
00178         
00187         private function getFFvalue($name,$section) {
00188                 $value = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], $name,$section);
00189                 return $value;
00190         }
00191 }
